page.title: 05Family Weekend in Ponteland
page.content: The average number of people in a family living in the same house is 4. {Saturday.}The majority of families seem to go out on Saturday.They mostly go out together maybe by car to a local town such as Morpeth or the city of Newcastle upon Tyne where they will do some shopping. Others will do domestic jobs in the house or tidy up the garden.This may involve cleaning with the help of an electric cleaner or washing the clothes using a washing machine.There will also be cooking and baking for the family to do.In the afternoon relations may be visited or some public event such as a farm or dog Show where the animals are taken and shown off to the judges who will award points for breeding quality,behaviour and grooming.In the evening parents go out to friends,a pub,or a restaurant.
